definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The tube holds the flint stone and the plate (?) the top of the inner case.
sentences.chinese: 机械手将火石管和弹簧片安装在内胆上。

sentences.english: Sheng is a mouth-blown free reed instrument consisting essentially of vertical bamboo pipes.
sentences.chinese: 笙是一种簧管类乐器，由一定数目的竹筒及簧片组成。

sentences.english: The third chapter introduces different types of reed.
sentences.chinese: 第三章介绍不同类型的簧片。

sentences.english: The provino (tuning table) is used to check the tuning of the reeds.
sentences.chinese: 调音台用来检测簧片的声音。

sentences.english: Casing centralizer with double bow spring blade is modified from single bow.
sentences.chinese: 使用最普遍的是单弓形弹簧片套管扶正器。

sentences.english: The most common woodwinds are the reed instruments.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的木管乐器是簧片乐器。

sentences.english: The oboe is a double reed wind instrument.
sentences.chinese: 双簧管是一个具有两片簧片的管乐器。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter concerns the discussion on relationship between reed types and performing practice.
sentences.chinese: 第五章是关于簧片类型与表演实践关系的论述。

sentences.english: The structure characteristics and design points of progresive die for the nut spring were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了螺母板簧片级进模结构特点和设计要点。

sentences.english: The clarinetist fitted a new reed onto his mouthpiece.
sentences.chinese: 那位吹木箫者在他的萧嘴上装了一个新簧片。

sentences.english: If equally thick section leaf is adopted, it has features of simple machining technology and high interchangeability .
sentences.chinese: 采用等厚断面的簧片，其加工工艺简单，互换性强。

sentences.english: The natural frequency of the blade of a Pohlmann whistle is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究簧片哨里簧片的固有频率。

sentences.english: The natural frequency of the blade of a Pohlmann whistle is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究簧片哨里簧片的固有频率。

sentences.english: Few peopele use the model. MS series can be replaced easily.
sentences.chinese: 这个琴比较冷，用MS系列的簧片应该可以替换。

definition: membrane which covers a hole in a flute and produces a buzzing tone
bolt (for locking a window, cabinet etc)/(electrical) plug
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
